original_title: Paris By Night 91: Huế, Sài Gòn, Hà Nội
overview: Paris By Night 91: Huế, Sài Gòn, Hà Nội is a Paris By Night program produced by Thúy Nga that was filmed at the Terrace Theater at the Long Beach Convention and Entertainment Center on January 12, 2008 and January 13, 2008.
title: Paris By Night 91: Huế, Sài Gòn, Hà Nội
